comment: A tender amendment is a formal change to the tender, and generally involves the publication of a new tender notice/release.
comment_es_MX: Una modificación a la contratación es un cambio formal a la misma, y generalmente implica la publicación de un nuevo aviso. La justificación y una descripción de los cambios realizados se pueden proporcionar aquí.

comment: A list of values in a data structure.

comment_es_MX: Una adjudicación para una contratación determinada. Puede haber más de una adjudicación por licitación, por ejemplo, porque se pueden adjudicar a varios proveedores.

comment: Documents sent by the bidder to bid for a contract.
A sum of money dedicated to a specific purpose.
The buyer is the entity whose budget will be used to purchase the goods. This may be different from the procuring entity who may be specified in the tender data.
comment_es_MX: El comprador es la institución pública que tiene asignado el presupuesto que se utilizará para el procedimiento de contratación. Éste puede ser diferente al área administrativa especificada en la etapa de licitación.

comment: A system to categorize goods, organizations, services, etc.
OCDS extension that is not developed and maintained by the OCP.
A document that, once agreed and signed by all parties, legally binds them.

es_MX: Notificación de la adjudicación del contrato

comment: http://standard.open-contracting.org/1.1/en/getting_started/contracting_process/
TO BE DELETED, it's too generic. See dedicated terms "core block", "core extension", etc.
A block of data that is part of the core standard, as opposed to blocks introduced by extensions.
OCDS extension that is part of the OCDS standard and maintained by the OCP.
The currency for each amount should always be specified using the uppercase 3-letter currency code from ISO4217.
A string a characters that uniquely identifies an entity.
A tender that is only advertised to a limited number of potential bidders.
Action of matching the members of two lists.
Activity of matching the members of two lists.

es_MX: Estándar de Datos de Contrataciones Abiertas

comment: A set of OCDS releases or records.
Each of the parties (organizations or other participants) referenced in a release must be included in the parties section.

comment_es_MX: Especifica el método de contratación utilizando method codelist. Esta es una lista de códigos cerrada. Los tipos de procedimiento de contratación locales deberán relacionarse a uno de los valores de esta lista. La información más específica de los tipos de procedimiento de contratación locales, diferentes a los valores de la lista cerrada, deberán especificarse en el campo "Detalles del tipo de procedimiento de contratación".

comment: The entity managing the procurement. This may be different from the buyer who pays for, or uses, the items being procured.
More or less synonym of "documentation".
"A rule or set of rules or requirements which are widely agreed upon or imposed by government." (Wiktionary)
Validation involves a technical check on the way data is structured and formatted. http://standard.open-contracting.org/1.1/en/getting_started/validation/
As opposed to the other types of deliverables that are services and goods.
